description:
Born on August 1st, 2006 as daughter of Fuyuka and http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] in Hawaii (USA). Being the child of the most powerful sorcerer of his time, Katsumi Liqueur has outstanding magical abilities as well (that http://anidb.net/ch13444 [Kiddy Phenyl] envies her for) but learns about these abilities only late and has a hard time to cope with her new responsibility.
She joins the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] during the first episodes of this story and gets real close to her police work instructor http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice]. Her nationality changes from American (she came from Hawaii to Tokyo) to Japanese during the events of the movies.
Her powers can be linked back to some http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk] blood in her veins, making her stand between the two warring parties of this story`s main conflict, ultimately leading to a fateful decision of hers.
name: Katsumi Liqueur
